channel.title: Showbuzz Theater Podcast
channel.description: The behind the scenes diaries of Broadway, Off Broadway and Regional Theater Productions.
channel.itunes:author: Show Buzz Online
channel.itunes:summary: Show Buzz: produces original, fresh, fascinating, behind-the-curtain blog entries, video blogs, and podcast of the backstage lives of Broadway, Off Broadway and Regional Theater cast and crew.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Behind-the-curtain diaries of Theater cast and crew.

item.title: Gypsy: Driving around getting for the road
item.description: Sam Kiernan phoning Show Buzz fans while driving riving around, getting ready to get back on the road with Gypsy to Modesto CA.
item.itunes:author: Show Buzz Online
item.itunes:summary: Sam Kiernan phoning Show Buzz fans while driving riving around, getting ready to get back on the road with Gypsy to Modesto CA.
